data.name: Deck of Ashes - Digital Expanded Artbook
data.detailed_description:
A unique and challenging puzzle adventure Tetragon is out now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1545850/Tetragon/


About the Game

ABOUT THIS CONTENT

80+ page art book with stunning hand-drawn game art and concepts.

CREDITS

Art director:
Ekaterina Belehova

Artists:
Irina Efremova
Mikhail Logachev
Yulia Novoseltseva
Karina Butenko

Translators:
Ekaterina Skorubskaya
Michael Otto
Matthias Otto
Ulla Hitzelberger-Otto

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 (1Gb) / Radeon R7 A10-7700K
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OSX 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 9xxx / ATI 2xxx
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MAC OSX 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
